titles.title: Enhanced Veteran Healthcare Act of 2015

To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for covered agreements and contracts between the Secretary of Veterans Affairs and eligible academic affiliates for the mutually beneficial coordination, use, or exchange of health-care resources, and for other purposes.
Enhanced Veteran Healthcare Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Enhanced Veteran Healthcare Act of 2015
This bill directs the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) to seek to enter into covered agreements and contracts for the mutually beneficial coordination, use, or exchange of covered VA health-care resources with eligible academic affiliates in order to improve access to, and quality of, VA hospital care and medical services.
